casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Anh Viet THAI. No. 7P06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. January 10, 2006. Julie Ramseur Lewis, Assistant Public Defender, for Anh Viet Thai. Peter S. Gilchrist, III, District Attorney, for State.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 9th day of January 2006 by Attorney General for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 10th day of January 2006."
